subject: Unable to login to the dashboard
description: Customer reports that they are getting an authentication error when trying to log in.

subject: Login error on dashboard
description: Login not working, authentication service fails.

subject: Reset password link expired
description: User tried to reset password but the link expired before use.

subject: Cannot access analytics
description: The analytics tab is not loading for multiple users.

subject: Dashboard authentication error
description: User reports the dashboard login shows auth failure.

subject: App crashes on start
description: Mobile app crashes immediately on startup for version 3.2.1.
